document.full_text: local favorite gael monfils reached the quarter-finals of the french open with a 6-4 2-6 7-5 1-6 8-6 win over spanish seventh seed david ferrer on monday.
document.title: monfils beats ferrer to reach last eight in paris
lines_and_colors: local favorite gael monfils reached the quarter-finals of the french open with a 6-4 2-6 7-5 1-6 8-6 win over spanish seventh seed david ferrer on monday.
